text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: tense atmosphere, two friends, playful mood>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: “You seem curiously excited, brother.”  

Razumihin: “Excited? Not a bit of it!”  

Raskolnikov: “You’re blushing! It’s noticeable.”  

---  

<setup: playful banter, lighthearted teasing>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: “Why are you wriggling out of it?”  

Razumihin: “What do you mean, nonsense?”  

Raskolnikov: “A Romeo over six foot high!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov observes Razumihin's unusual excitement and playfully teases him about it.
